[00:00.41]Composed by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Joshua Luellen
[00:00.62]Southside on the track yeah
[00:02.64]Yeah
[00:05.46]Got the 'Rari outside
[00:06.83]Got the Maybach outside no lie no lie
[00:11.15]Got the 'Rari outside
[00:12.64]Got the Maybach outside no lie no lie
[00:16.97]In the penthouse in my room
[00:18.11]I can touch the sky yeah yeah
[00:19.90]I just woke up with a dime holdin' a nine yeah yeah
[00:22.80]I just stuffed a Backwood with a three-five yeah yeah
[00:25.62]Off the top rope Andre the Giant yeah yeah
[00:28.56]I just put a brand new Phantom on my credit card
[00:31.40]I just bought the Rollie store with my credit card
[00:34.37]Put two hundred racks on my b***h debit card
[00:37.22]I put two hundred racks on your whole squad
[00:40.13]I'm a big time n***a I don't owe no n***as
[00:43.03]Cut a five million-dollar check I blow that n***a
[00:45.91]Twenty million-dollar liquid I can show that n***a
[00:48.76]Aquafina on me drippin' you can't pour this n***a
[00:51.71]I perform with my drum you must don't know me n***a
[00:54.67]Got a thoroughbred b***h down in Texas n***a
[00:57.50]I can tell she got a man from how she text me n***a
[01:00.33]I been flexin' all my life you can't finesse me n***a
[01:03.30]I been in the bando with the chick
[01:06.10]Buy Jimmy Choo sandals 'cause I'm rich
[01:08.85]I put the pool on the top floor
[01:11.75]These thot h*es they free promo
[01:14.75]I'ma keep my ho in Chanel Coco
[01:17.52]Puttin' butterfly doors on a four-door
[01:19.90]Yeah I been in the bando with the chick
[01:23.32]Buy Jimmy Choo sandals 'cause I'm rich
[01:26.20]I come through turbo hit the switch
[01:28.47]Come through turbo
[01:29.01]You only do pink diamonds when you rich
[01:31.14]You only do pink diamonds
[01:32.20]I threw cotton candy diamonds on my b***h yeah yeah
[01:35.04]Got the Rollie face same Kansas City yeah yeah
[01:37.96]I'm just a walkin' d**g store don't you be mindin' me
[01:40.84]I just spend ten thousand on a 'fit and I got that iron on me
[01:43.74]I'm on a whole 'nother wave I'm surfin' in a new Ferrari
[01:46.59]I just been sippin' I'm drippin'
[01:47.51]I'm spillin' I'm s**ttin' on everybody
[01:49.53]I got ten kilos on my wrist yeah yeah
[01:52.45]Outer space froze cold in my pics yeah yeah
[01:55.24]Platinum ice rose gold on my wrist yeah yeah
[01:58.14]I got a closet for a condo
[02:01.14]Got the 'Rari outside got the Maybach outside no lie no lie
[02:06.90]In the penthouse in my room
[02:08.00]I can touch the sky yeah yeah
[02:09.77]I just woke up with a dime holdin' a nine yeah yeah

[ti:Touch The Sky (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:High Off Life (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.41]//
[00:00.62]Southside制作
[00:02.64]//
[00:05.46]外面停着法拉利
[00:06.83]外面停着迈巴赫 没有说谎
[00:11.15]外面停着法拉利
[00:12.64]外面停着迈巴赫 没有说谎
[00:16.97]在我的顶层套房中
[00:18.11]我可以触摸天空
[00:19.90]我和漂亮姑娘一起醒来 手里握着一把枪
[00:22.80]我刚给雪茄烟里加了点料
[00:25.62]身处行业之最 我就是巨人安德雷
[00:28.56]我刚用我的信用卡买了一辆全新劳斯莱斯幻影
[00:31.40]我刚用我的信用卡买光了劳力士店里的东西
[00:34.37]给我女人的储蓄卡里存入二十万
[00:37.22]我花二十万悬赏你整个帮派的人头
[00:40.13]我是个大人物了 我不欠任何人的
[00:43.03]五百万 全部挥霍光 兄弟
[00:45.91]我花两千万都不眨眼 我可以让你看看 兄弟
[00:48.76]我身上戴着金银珠宝 你根本就觊觎不来 兄弟
[00:51.71]我表演的时候都带着武器 你肯定不了解我 兄弟
[00:54.67]在德克萨斯找了个血统纯正的女人 兄弟
[00:57.50]从她给我发的短信 我就看得出来 她是有男朋友的 兄弟
[01:00.33]我这一辈子都过得很风光 你别想操纵我 兄弟
[01:03.30]我一直和这姑娘在做生意的地方
[01:06.10]买Jimmy Choo的凉鞋 因为我有钱
[01:08.85]我把泳池设在顶层
[01:11.75]这些娘们都免费为我服务
[01:14.75]我要让我的女人穿上香奈儿
[01:17.52]给四门跑车换上蝴蝶式车门
[01:19.90]我一直和这姑娘在做生意的地方
[01:23.32]买Jimmy Choo的凉鞋 因为我有钱
[01:26.20]我风风火火地来 按一下开关
[01:28.47]风风火火地来
[01:29.01]只有在你有钱的时候 才买得起粉色钻石
[01:31.14]那时候才买得起粉钻
[01:32.20]我给我的女人买各种颜色的钻石
[01:35.04]戴着大大的劳力士手表 简直不要太耀眼
[01:37.96]我就是个行走的供货商 你不要管我
[01:40.84]我花了一万块买衣服 我身上带着武器
[01:43.74]我的潮流与众不同 我开着全新法拉利飞驰
[01:46.59]我喝着美酒 我穿金戴银
[01:47.51]我对任何人都不屑一顾
[01:49.53]我的手腕上有好多钻石
[01:52.45]珠宝冰凉 就像在外太空 照片中都透着一股凉意
[01:55.24]铂金钻戒 手腕上戴着玫瑰金的手表
[01:58.14]我有个地方专门用来存放豪宅钥匙
[02:01.14]外面停着法拉利 外面停着迈巴赫 没有说谎
[02:06.90]在我的顶层套房中
[02:08.00]我可以触摸天空
[02:09.77]我和漂亮姑娘一起醒来 手里握着一把枪
[02:12.67]我刚给雪茄烟里加了点料
[02:15.58]身处行业之最 我就是巨人安德雷
[02:18.48]我一直和这姑娘在做生意的地方
[02:21.26]买Jimmy Choo的凉鞋 因为我有钱
